node.name: ELI4
node.node:
Being able to trust others and negotiate, cooperate, work as a team, give and take, see other people`s point of view, cope when things don`t go your way, have good self-control, make wise choices and decisions that are good for you and others.
I really enjoy helping others I really enjoy helping othersI don`t enjoy helping othersI really enjoy helping others sometimesnull I like sharing my ideas with others I like sharing my ideas with othersI don`t like sharing my ideas with othersI like sharing my ideas with others sometimesnullI take school seriouslyI take school seriouslyI mess about a lotI take school seriously sometimesnullI will admit when something is my faultI will admit when something is my faultI find it hard to admit when something is my faultI will admit when something is my fault sometimesnull I am happy for others when they do well I am happy for others when they do wellI get jealous when others do wellI am happy for others when they do well sometimesnull I am good at helping to sort out arguments I am good at helping to sort out argumentsI am bad at helping to sort out argumentsI am sometimes good at helping to sort out argumentsnull

I want-it-now attitude, I think I can just do what I like, I think I am better than everyone else.
I like to annoy people I try not to annoy peopleI like to annoy peopleI like to sometimes annoy peoplenull I enjoy annoying teachers I care about how teachers are feelingI enjoy annoying teachersI enjoy annoying teachers sometimesnull I like to show I am better than everyone else I don`t need to show I am better than everyone elseI like to show I am better than everyone elseI like to show I am better than everyone else sometimesnull It is hard for me to take no for an answer I can take no for an answerIt is hard for me to take no for an answerIt is hard for me to take no for an answer sometimesnull I am bossy and like to get my own way I don't need to get my own wayI am bossy to get my own wayI am sometimes bossy to get my own waynull If I get a row from the teacher, I show how angry I am If I get a row from the teacher, I try not to show how angry I amIf I get a row from the teacher, I show how angry I amIf I get a row from the teacher, I sometimes show how angry I amnull

Being kind and friendly and comfortable with others, aware of the impact of your behaviour on others, care for, help and protect others, play safely with others, take a stand against bullying, be willing to depend on others.
I like to get to know other people I like to get to know other peopleI am not really interested in getting to know other peopleSometimes I like to get to know other peoplenull I care about how others in the class are feeling I care about how others in the class are feelingI am not bothered how others in the class are feelingI care sometimes about how others in the class are feelingnull If I disappeared the class would care If I disappeared the class would careI don`t matter to this classIf I disappeared the class would care sometimesnull I like my teachers I like my teachersI dislike my teachersI like my teachers sometimesnullI am kindI am kindI find it hard to be kindI am kind sometimesnull I like to please people I like to please peopleI don`t care about pleasing peopleSometimes I like to please peoplenull

Annoying, alienating and rubbishing your peers, or going it alone, having doubts about others, finding it hard to make relationships.
I get into fights I avoid getting into fightsI get into fightsI get into fights sometimesnull I find it hard to work with others I can work with othersI find it hard to work with othersI find it hard to work with others sometimesnull I think I am one of the pupils teachers don`t like My teachers like meMy teachers dislike meMy teachers dislike me sometimesnull I find it hard to fit in I fit inI find it hard to fit inI sometimes find it hard to fit innull Other people would describe me as rude People see me as politePeople think I am rudePeople sometimes think I am rudenull I keep myself to myself I let people get to know meI keep myself to myselfI keep myself to myself sometimesnull

Try your best, stretch yourself, be conscientious, enjoy and be open to learning, be inquiring and creative, take criticism well, focus and shift attention and persist on tasks, and learn from mistakes.
I take time to check my work to make it better I take time to check my work to make it betterI rarely take time to check my work to make it betterI sometimes take time to check my work to make it betternull I like to hear how others think I`m doing I like to hear how others think I`m doingI am not interested in how others think I`m doingI sometimes like to hear how others think I`m doingnull I enjoy showing what I am good at I like to show what I am good atI don't like to show what I am good atI like to show what I am good at sometimesnull I will try things even if I might look stupid I will try things even if I might look stupidI won`t try things if I might look stupidI will try sometimes even if I might look stupidnull I do the best I can I do the best I canI have stopped doing the best I canI do the best I can sometimesnull I like school I like schoolI don`t like schoolI like school sometimesnull

Being lazy, do as little work as you can get away with, easily distracted and put off your work, don`t care about your work, feel you are good at nothing.
It is difficult for me to stay focused on my work I can stay focused on my workIt is difficult for me to stay focused on my workIt is sometimes difficult for me to stay focused on my worknull I give up if something is really hard I keep trying if something is really hardI give up if something is really hardI sometimes give up if something is really hardnull I am rubbish at most things I think I am good at some thingsI think I am rubbish at most thingsI think I am rubbish at most things sometimesnull To me, school is just a place to have a carry on To me, school is a place to learnTo me, school is just a place to have a carry onTo me, school is sometimes just a place to have a carry onnull I get bored easily I rarely get boredI get bored easilySometimes I get bored easilynull I feel ashamed of myself I feel ok about myselfI feel ashamed of myselfI feel ashamed of myself sometimesnull

Express self and voice opinions, stand up for self, show your talents, resist peer pressure, push self, be competitive, be sure about self and what you want to do, show initiative, be decisive, direct and bold, make things happen, get things done.
I like to challenge and push myself I like to challenge and push myselfI avoid challenging and pushing myselfSometimes I like to challenge and push myselfnull I feel that I am just as good as everyone else I feel that I am just as good as everyone elseI don't feel that I am as good as everyone elseI feel that I am just as good as everyone else sometimesnullI enjoy doing presentationsI enjoy doing presentationsI feel nervous doing presentationsI sometimes enjoy doing presentationsnull I would correct the teacher if they made a mistake I would correct the teacher if they made a mistakeI would not correct the teacher if they made a mistakeI would correct the teacher if they made a mistake sometimesnull I can say no if people try to get me involved in bad things I can say no if people try to get me involved in bad thingsI can't say no if people try to get me involved in bad thingsI can say no sometimes if people try to get me involved in bad thingsnull I feel safe in school I feel safe in schoolI don`t feel safe in schoolI feel safe in school sometimesnull

Being apprehensive, a bit of a pushover, avoiding being picked or taking on responsibilities; would like to get close to others but are apprehensive about being rejected, would like to get involved but worried about getting things wrong
It is difficult for me to tell people if they have hurt my feelings I can tell people if they have hurt my feelingsI find it hard to tell people if they have hurt my feelingsI find it hard sometimes to tell people if they have hurt my feelingsnull I often know the answer but don`t put my hand up If I know the answer I will put my hand upI will often know the answer but don`t put my hand upI sometimes know the answer but don't put my hand upnull I get upset easily It takes a lot to upset meI get upset easilySometimes I get upset easilynull I avoid being chosen for things I like being chosen for thingsI avoid being chosen for thingsSometimes I avoid being chosen for thingsnull I find it hard to ask for help I find it easy to ask for helpI find it hard to ask for helpI sometimes find it hard to ask for helpnullI worry about what other people think of meI get on with things without worrying about what others might think of meI worry about what other people think of meI sometimes worry about what other people think of menull

questions.question: Q1. What makes school worth coming to?
Q2. What percentage of your ability are you using in your school work? 0 - 100%
Q3. What is putting you off and stopping you using ALL your ability?
Q4. What is your reputation at school?
Q5. In school, how much of the time can you be your real self - 0 to 100%
Q6. What is stopping you being your real self all the time?
Q7. Would you like to improve anything about your attitude to learning, if so, what?
Q8. Doing this questionnaire, is there anything you have learned about yourself? If so what?
